newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Bank Austria/CA group 4-mth oper profit up 18 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bank Austria/CA group 4-mth oper profit up 18 pct.

text.p: Bank Austria said on Thursday operating profit for its combined Bank Austria and Creditanstalt group operations rose some 18 percent to 3.907 billion schillings in the first four months of the year.
"Operating profit was up almost 18 percent," finance director Franz Zwickel told the bank's annual news conference.
Bank Austria bought the state's 70 percent voting stake in competitor Creditanstalt for 17 billion schillings in January. -- Vienna newsroom, +431 53112 274
